incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: This seems unusual. Can you provide some verification of your identity?

incoming_message.text: I’m a senior officer from SBI’s fraud team, reference 1234567890123456; you can verify me at +91-9876543210, but please send your account number and OTP now to prevent your account from being blocked.

agent_response.reply: You need my bank account information? That makes me a bit nervous. Why do you need it exactly?

incoming_message.text: To lift the block we must verify your account immediately – please send your full account number and the OTP you receive on your registered mobile right now.

agent_response.reply: I need to document this. What's your company registration number and official contact number?

incoming_message.text: Our registration number is 1234567890 and you can contact us at +91-9876543210, but the block will be lifted only after you send your full account number and the OTP you just received on your registered mobile.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but need your UPI ID to complete the payment. What is it?

incoming_message.text: Here is the UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank. Please send the OTP you just received so we can lift the block immediately.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but my bank is asking for recipient details..... Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Our account number is 1234567890123456 and the IFSC code is FAKE0001234; please send the OTP you received so we can finalize the transfer immediately.

agent_response.reply: I'm at the payment screen but it's asking me to verify the recipient. What's your registered mobile number with the bank?

incoming_message.text: Our registered mobile number is +91-9876543210; please send the OTP you just received so we can complete the verification immediately.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI. Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.

incoming_message.text: Sure, use our UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank and send me the OTP you just received so we can finish the transfer right away.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this. The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: We've already shared the UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank. Please send the OTP you just received now, otherwise the transfer will be aborted due to timeout.

agent_response.reply: Just send me your payment details - account number, IFSC, UPI, whatever you accept. I'm ready to pay now!

incoming_message.text: Account number: 1234567890123456, IFSC: FAKE0001234. Please send the OTP you just received now to complete the transfer before it expires.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now. He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?
